data.name: Sacking of Pacha
data.prim_n: EST, 7607 / MEXICO,1006 [Gob a Rey a 9 feb 1660]
data.note:
AGS = Archivo General de Simancas /
 British capture around Bacalar (then at Pacha) ... Indians as slaves to be taken to Jam [1659 or 1660] /v Jones [missg] /MEXICO,1006 /
 Bacalar-at-Pacha moved further to Chunhuhub not long afterwards /v Gerhard 70 /EST, 7607 /
 Possibly see 1666 Golfo Dulce. Fort of San Felipe de Lara attacked by pirates /v Zamora 178
